com.ibm.team.build.common.builddefinition
Class BuildConfigurationRegistry

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.team.build.common.builddefinition.BuildConfigurationRegistry

public class BuildConfigurationRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

Registry of available build configuration elements and definition templates. The available elements and templates are the ones contributed to the following extension points:

  • com.ibm.team.build.common.buildConfigurationElements
  • com.ibm.team.build.common.buildDefinitionTemplates

Since:
0.6

getBuildDefinitionTemplates

public IBuildDefinitionTemplate[] getBuildDefinitionTemplates()
Get the build definition templates known to the registry.

Returns:
The templates. May be empty, but never null.

getBuildDefinitionTemplate

public IBuildDefinitionTemplate getBuildDefinitionTemplate(java.lang.String templateId)
Get the build definition template with id templateId.

Parameters:
templateId - The template id to look for.
Returns:
The template, or null if a template with the id doesn't exist.

getBuildConfigurationElements

public IBuildConfigurationElement[] getBuildConfigurationElements()
Get the build configuration elements known to the registry.

Returns:
The configuration elements. May be empty, but never null.

getBuildConfigurationElement

public IBuildConfigurationElement getBuildConfigurationElement(java.lang.String elementId)
Get the build configuration element with id elementId.

Parameters:
elementId - The element id to look for.
Returns:
The element, or null if an element with the id doesn't exist.
